name: Flappy Holidays
description:
Controls:

      PC:    Press space bar or left mouse click to fly

      Gamepad:  South button (e.g., "A" on xbox controller)

      Mobile or Tablet:   Just tap the screen to fly

Tap the screen to fly Santa's sleigh.  Santa will deliver a present to each chimney he passes, just be sure not to run into them.


* Santa needs your help delivering gifts to all the families out there!

* Holiday fun for the whole family!

* See who can deliver the most gifts!

Thanks for playing.  If you like it, please consider donating. 

Happy Holidays!
Five cent media

(Also available on Google Play and Windows. See links below.)
